title: Biblical Dating
verses: 1 Thessalonians 4:3–4 (WEB) — “This is the will of God: your sanctification… that each one know how to control his own body.”
Proverbs 4:23 (WEB) — “Keep your heart with all diligence, for out of it is the wellspring of life.”
2 Corinthians 6:14 (WEB) — “Don’t be unequally yoked with unbelievers.”
Philippians 4:8 (WEB) — “Whatever is true… pure… lovely… think about these things.”
body: Date in the light of Christ: pursue holiness, honesty, and wise counsel. Guard your heart from fantasy and pressure. Seek someone who shares faith and character, and practice sacrificial love that honors God and one another.
prayer: Lord, guide my relationships. Give me wisdom, purity, and patience. Align my desires with Your will and form Christlike love in me. Amen.
